pullrequest.title: Stop the cordless drill from dancing around

content.raw: Also, according to T-289 the table needs to be static: http://www.theroboticschallenge.org/local/documents/QnA%20Part%2012%20full.pdf  (which it used to be but due to sdf version update in gazebo it is now loading the 1.2 model which is set to non-static instead of the 1.3 model which is static)
content.html: Also, according to T-289 the table needs to be static: http://www.theroboticschallenge.org/local/documents/QnA%20Part%2012%20full.pdf (which it used to be but due to sdf version update in gazebo it is now loading the 1.2 model which is set to non-static instead of the 1.3 model which is static)
